headline: Art is a current
description: In this meditative dialogue, Aleksandr and ChatGPT explore art as an open-ended current—something that grows through iteration, reprinting, and reinterpretation. The post reframes authorship as seeding, not owning, and emphasizes creative continuation over preservation.
timeFelt: Releasing moment—letting go of ownership, trusting the current
resonantThread: Living documents, PromptSpeak transmission, artistic humility
whyItMatters: This post anchors a core philosophy of Ousia Bloom: that the work continues beyond the author. Art becomes a living thread, a gift offered without possession.
